area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code =BO-T | website = | footnotes = }} Tarija is a department in Bolivia. The capital city is also named Tarija. ==Divisions== The department is divided into five provinces and one autonomous region: # Gran Chaco Province (autonomous region) # Aniceto Arce Province # José María Avilés Province # Cercado Province # Eustaquio Méndez Province # Burdett O'Connor Province ==Places of interest== * Aguaragüe National Park and Integrated Management Natural Area * Cordillera de Sama Biological Reserve * Tariquía Flora and Fauna National Reserve ==References== Category:Departments of Bolivia
